title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: AI-Driven Multimedia IT Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical knowledge and understanding of information technology concepts
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply math-based information technology problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy using an AI-driven multimedia system.
Learners can practice complex mathematical concepts at least three times using the visualization and voice recognition features of the ICA-AI framework.
Learners can perform and analyze personalized diagnostic assessments at least twice in an adaptive learning system based on Genetic Algorithms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
